meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Russia.
meanings.sent1: In Russia, you can buy many things with rubles.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for rubles at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The rubles in my pocket jingled as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth a million rubles.
meanings.sent5: The rubles sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in several countries in Eastern Europe.
meanings.sent1: She saved up enough rubles to go on a trip to Eastern Europe.
meanings.sent2: The market only accepted rubles as payment.
meanings.sent3: I found a lucky ruble on the street today!
meanings.sent4: His generosity was like a handful of rubles in a time of need.
meanings.sent5: The rubles clinked together in his pocket, a comforting sound.
